DOC.brief_summary: Caffeine will be studied against placebo in patients with positional headache after a lumbar puncture (aka "spinal headache").
DOC.brief_title: Caffeine Versus Placebo for Spinal Headaches
DOC.detailed_description: Pain will be assessed at set intervals using a Visual Analog Scale. Blood patch therapy will be offered to all those still in pain at the end of one hour after drug administration.
DOC.criteria: diagnosed with post dural puncture headache age < 18 pregnant allergic to caffeine cardiac or peripheral vascular disease uncontrolled hypertension
